segments.text: It's my wife's birthday . I need to buy some flowers for her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Most women love red roses for their birthday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much will the roses be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can get a dozen for only $ 20 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now , that's a price that I like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're in luck today because the roses are on sale .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . Perhaps you'd like something else to go with the roses ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , the roses are good enough .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Women love roses , so your wife will be very happy .
segments.speaker: S2
